name: docsy/faq-block
title: FAQ Block
description: Example block scaffolded with Create Block tool.

default.question: How do I create my first booking?
default.answer: To create your first booking, navigate to the dashboard and click "New Booking". Follow the setup wizard to configure your service details, availability, and pricing options.

default.question: Can I customize the booking form design?
default.answer: Yes! You can fully customize your booking form's appearance including colors, fonts, and layout to match your brand. Access the customization options in Settings > Appearance.

default.question: How do payment processing and fees work?
default.answer: We integrate with major payment processors like Stripe and PayPal. Transaction fees vary by payment method, typically 2.9% + 30Â¢ per transaction. You can view detailed fee structures in your billing settings.

default.question: Is there a mobile app available?
default.answer: Currently, we offer a fully responsive web application that works seamlessly on mobile devices. Native mobile apps for iOS and Android are planned for future release.

default.question: How can I integrate with my existing website?
default.answer: Integration is simple! You can embed booking forms using our widget code, use our WordPress plugin, or integrate via our REST API. Detailed integration guides are available in our documentation.
